I know in the past there have been some RPs I have not been keeping 
up wit=
h, but at least I made that attempt to notify that I would be 
missing or n=
ot around if I was too busy. But when I had a little more 
time and could, =
I always come back to the RPs. My focus is upon the 
story and the regular =
interaction with other players. I'm telling a 
story not just for my own fu=
n and benefit, but for those out there 
who may be lurking and reading thes=
es stories. And believe me, people 
DO come and glance at these. I've had a=
 fan base in the past from 
some of my role playing stories. Those stories =
only fail or end when 
other players do NOT remain involved. 

Get involved=
 people! If you join ANY Role Playing game or story, you 
MUST realize that=
 you should make that commitment to role play often. 
Take that time. Trust=
 me, it's not that hard to do so. Otherwise, if 
no rules or guidelines hav=
e been laid down how often you should play, 
then state how often you can p=
lay OOC in the list or forum you are 
involved in. Get to know the story an=
d how fast that pace is. 
Especially when you are interacting with other pe=
ople... those people 
wait on you. Some RPs I've been in in the past... peo=
ple will 
continue to post and leave you behind if you can't keep up with a=
 
story. But your lack of commitment to something you joined is not the 
fa=
ult of others. 

Perhaps this is rude of me... but I've been doing this a l=
ong, long 
time.. these online role playing stories. I'm only passing along=
 to 
you what was said to me and what has happened to me. It can be 
frustr=
ating and turns people off when you are left behind. But there 
is a differ=
ence in how you are left behind. Don't be left behind at 
your own fault ca=
use you refuse to take the time to post. Remember... 
you are affecting som=
eone else. Another player's character is held up 
by you and they can't do =
anything until you post something, whether 
IC or OOC. 

You join, be commi=
tted. And use communication! 



~Lady B
